titleStmt.title: A relation of the late dreadful tempest, or hurricane that happened in Holland and Utrech, on Wednesday the 22d. of July, 1674. between seven and eight of the clock at night, taken out of several letters to merchants in London. Published to prevent false reports.

A relation of the late dreadful tempest, or hurricane that happened in Holland and Utrech, on Wednesday the 22d. of July, 1674. between seven and eight of the clock at night, taken out of several letters to merchants in London. Published to prevent false reports.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Dorman Newman, at the sign of the Kings-Armes in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
